languages.text: "Доверите еретичке заваривать вам {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}рекаф{/g}? Тогда стоит взять еще десяток местных простолюдинов — пробовать все, что проходит через руки преступницы".

traits.locale_text: "Настоятельный совет, Вольный Торговец: перед употреблением проверяйте ее напитки на наличие ядовитых веществ".
traits.speaker: SolomorneCompanion

languages.text: "You're going to trust a heretic with brewing your {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}recaf{/g}? Then, you ought to take a dozen local commoners along as well, to taste anything that criminal has handled."
languages.original_text: "Доверите еретичке заваривать вам {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}рекаф{/g}? Тогда стоит взять еще десяток местных простолюдинов — пробовать все, что проходит через руки преступницы".

traits.locale_text: "Are you going to trust a heretic with brewing your recaf? Then you ought to take a dozen local commoners along to taste anything that criminal has handled."
"Are you going to trust a heretic with brewing your recaf? Then you ought to take a dozen local commoners along to taste anything that criminal has handled."
"You're going to trust a heretic with brewing your recaf? Then, you ought to take a dozen local commoners along as well, to taste anything that criminal has handled."

"You're going to trust a heretic with brewing your recaf? Then, you ought to take a dozen local commoners along as well, to taste anything that criminal has handled."
"You're going to trust a heretic with brewing your {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}recaf{/g}? Then, you ought to take a dozen local commoners along as well, to taste anything that criminal has handled."

languages.text: “你打算让一个异端分子给你泡{g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}雷卡咖啡{/g}？既然这样，你应该多带上十几个这里的平民。无论这个罪犯做了什么吃的东西，都应该让那些人先尝尝。”
languages.original_text: "You're going to trust a heretic with brewing your {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}recaf{/g}? Then, you ought to take a dozen local commoners along as well, to taste anything that criminal has handled."

traits.locale_text: “你打算让一个异端分子给你泡咖啡？既然这样，你应该多带上十几个这里的平民。无论这个罪犯做了什么吃的东西，都应该让那些人先尝尝。”

languages.text: 「異端者が淹れた{g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}模造コーヒー{/g}を信用しろとおっしゃるのですか？では、犯罪者が触れた物を味見するために、現地人を1ダースほど連れて行く必要があるということになりますね」
languages.original_text: "You're going to trust a heretic with brewing your {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}recaf{/g}? Then, you ought to take a dozen local commoners along as well, to taste anything that criminal has handled."

traits.locale_text: 「異端者が淹れた模造コーヒーを信用しろとおっしゃるのですか？では、犯罪者が触れた物を味見するために、現地人を1ダースほど連れて行く必要があるということになりますね」

languages.text: «¿Va a fiarse de una hereje para que le sirva el {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}café{/g}? En ese caso, más vale que se lleve a otra docena de lugareños para que caten todo lo que le prepare esa criminal».
languages.original_text: "You're going to trust a heretic with brewing your {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}recaf{/g}? Then, you ought to take a dozen local commoners along as well, to taste anything that criminal has handled."

traits.locale_text: «¿Va a fiarse de una hereje para que le sirva el café? En ese caso, más vale que se lleve a otra docena de lugareños para que caten todo lo que le prepare esa criminal».

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}Kahfenizi{/g} bir kâfire mi demleteceksiniz? O hâlde bu suçlunun elinin değdiği her şeyi tatması için on kadar buralı avamı da almanız gerekli."
languages.original_text: "You're going to trust a heretic with brewing your {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}recaf{/g}? Then, you ought to take a dozen local commoners along as well, to taste anything that criminal has handled."

traits.locale_text: "Kahfenizi bir kâfire mi demleteceksiniz? O hâlde bu suçlunun elinin değdiği her şeyi tatması için on kadar buralı avamı da almanız gerekli."

languages.text: « Vous feriez confiance à une hérétique pour vous préparer du {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}recaff{/g} ? Alors, je vous recommande de vous faire accompagner par une douzaine de roturiers locaux, pour leur faire goûter tout ce que cette criminelle a touché. »
languages.original_text: "You're going to trust a heretic with brewing your {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}recaf{/g}? Then, you ought to take a dozen local commoners along as well, to taste anything that criminal has handled."

traits.locale_text: « Vous feriez confiance à une hérétique pour vous préparer du recaff ? Alors, je vous recommande de vous faire accompagner par une douzaine de roturiers locaux, pour leur faire goûter tout ce que cette criminelle a touché. »

languages.text: "Ihr wollt einer Ketzerin die Zubereitung Eures {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}Rekaf{/g} anvertrauen? Dann solltet Ihr noch ein Dutzend einfacher Bürger von hier mitnehmen, als Vorkoster für alles, was diese Verbrecherin zusammenrührt."
languages.original_text: "You're going to trust a heretic with brewing your {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}recaf{/g}? Then, you ought to take a dozen local commoners along as well, to taste anything that criminal has handled."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr wollt einer Ketzerin die Zubereitung Eures Rekaf anvertrauen? Dann solltet Ihr noch ein Dutzend einfacher Bürger von hier mitnehmen, als Vorkoster für alles, was diese Verbrecherin zusammenrührt."
